extendedInfo.description: Advanced Job Tracker is an elegant application that lets you keep track of your job search.  Simple and beautiful design, this app is sure to help you on your journey.Keep track of:- Company information- Contact information- Specific position information- The status of your application- Any notes you may have- etcPermissions are needed for analytics to help make future releases better

reviews.title: Almost There!
reviews.comment: This ap makes job hunting so much easier! It needs options asking WHEN you applied and how long the business makes you wait till you can reapply. It also needs a section for not hiring.The spyware warning from my virus scanner makes me uneasy and I would adore an explanation of what is causing that.
reviews.author: Alisia Thursby

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: Simple application that suits my needs perfectly
reviews.author: A Google User
